definition: To seek retribution or take vengeance for a perceived wrongdoing or harm inflicted upon oneself or others. This word is commonly used to describe the act of seeking revenge or retaliating against someone who has caused harm or offense.

examples.german: Ich werde mich für diese Beleidigung rächen.
examples.english: I will take revenge for this insult.

examples.german: Er rächte den Tod seines Bruders.
examples.english: He avenged the death of his brother.

examples.german: Sie rächte sich an ihrem betrügerischen Partner.
examples.english: She got revenge on her deceitful partner.

examples.german: Die Familie schwor, den Mord an ihrem Sohn zu rächen.
examples.english: The family vowed to avenge the murder of their son.

examples.german: Er rächte sich, indem er ihren Ruf ruinierte.
examples.english: He sought revenge by ruining her reputation.
